items.text: good length outside off, but this ball stays low! Hope tries to drag a pull from outside off but misses
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.preText: Waleed Zahoor: "@mohammad ali, more or less the same team played the 2015 World Cup. The thing is Pollard, Bravo's, Dwayne Smith are just not good enough for ODI's, they have reputation, but are not consistent performers for longer formats of the game. For t20is it will work, but it wont for ODI's"
items.text: good length outside off, and pulled down the ground to long on
items.postText: Akhil : "@muhammad ali WI will win nothing with those players. remember same guys played together barring a couple between 2010 to 13 and they won nothing absolutely nothing."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: slower ball full outside off, and the drive to cover is misfielded by the infielder! Shakib the guilty man this time, but thankfully (for Bangladesh) there's someone at long off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: slower ball again, and this is disguised much better. Hope flicks it away to the leg side, but the ball takes a leading edge and lands safely beyond midwicket. Excellent skill from the Bangladesh captain
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle, but angling into the batsman. He mistimes a pull to the fielder in the deep, and Powell has enough time to call for the second
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 2 runs

items.text: full outside off, and Powell's attempted slog takes the inside edge! Beats the stumps, and the keeper, but short fine leg does well to bring the ball back
items.postText: Bkarthik: "If ban lose today in the last over...can we (SA) officially hand them the chokers tag? "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 2 runs

items.text: full outside off, and Powell muscles a shot to long on. Uses the bottom hand to lift it over the non-striker
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, but Powell already walks across to the pitch of the delivery before driving over cover. Slices this shot over the infield
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, but deceived by the change-up delivery! Goes for the drive over cover, but the ball goes past his outside edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: full outside off, but Hope walks across to the off side (exposing all three stumps), trying to flick it behind square. The ball hits the inside of his bat, goes between his legs, and eventually ends up in the keeper's gloves
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: full outside off, and he throws his hands at it. The drive takes another top edge through to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: takes the screws off this! How powerful was that. Just a bit too full outside off, and Powell clears his front leg before tonking this over cow corner
items.postText: A lot of happy Bangladesh fans in the crowd today at Warner Park. Flags out, smiles out, a great sight overall. Courtney Walsh, the Bangladesh bowling coach, though, looks worried
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, SIX runs

items.text: full outside off, and Powell misses the drive. The ball goes over the tramlines and the umpire calls wide. Mushfiqur isn't happy, probably because the batsman moved to the off side too
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, 1 wide

items.text: the extra ball goes for four! Low full toss outside off, and Powell drills this past the non-striker for a boundary. Almost takes Hope with him to the ropes too. Raw power.
items.postText: Sneh : "Don't want to jinx anyone, but Powell has started off well and he seems to have potential to replicate the inning of Mehmudullah, which will bring WI very closer to the target."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, FOUR runs

items.text: holes out at deep midwicket! Shakib gets under this, and finally Bangladesh hold onto a catch. The offcutter from Mashrafe enticed Hope to go for a big shot, but the slog is not timed well enough
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, OUT

dismissal.text: SD Hope c Shakib Al Hasan b Mashrafe Mortaza 64 (94b 5x4 0x6) SR: 68.08

items.text: full on off, and Powell's attempted drive comes off the inside edge. Trickles down to deep square leg
items.postText: KP: "Finally some Hope for west indies."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and pushed to long on. Gets off the mark, and wants a double too, but that ain't happening
items.postText: Davo from Guyan: "Thanks Shakib...sincerely, every West Indian."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Holder, 1 run

items.text: slower ball, full on off stump. Pushed down the ground again to long on, but only for a single. Bangladesh won't mind these. Not one bit
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and Holder defends into the gap near cover to steal a single
items.postText: Khalilur Rahman: "Windies are not out of the game yet. Powel is playing wonderfully, Holder is there and BD has problem bowling in death overs."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Holder, 1 run

items.text: slow and wide outside off stump. Powell drags a flat-batted shot down the ground to long on. He'll keep strike
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: knee-high full toss outside off, and Powell check-punches a slog over cow corner! No real followthrough of the bat. Just brute force. Excellent start to the over from West Indies
items.postText: MahneelMusa: "This has been a fantastic series for the neutral fans. But for us Bangladeshis, taking into account the cricket played and the time of broadcast, it has been more than just a rollercoaster of emotions. Tough job!"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, SIX runs

items.text: full outside of, and he misses out on this slog. Drills a shot into his own boots as the ball dribbles away to the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, and the drive is sliced to Mehidy at point. Quick work from the fielder, as he has a shy at the stumps. Misses, but the quick work forces the batsmen to say no to the single
items.postText: KP: "A neutral fan from India, wide awake at 2.30am almost wanting to see a classic contest. Hope had almost put me into sleep, finally some excitement to this contest."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Holder, 1 run

items.text: yorker outside off, and Powell's attempted jab takes the inside edge to the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, and driven square off the front foot to the fielder at deep point. Just a single. Good comeback from Fizz after that six off the first ball
items.postText: But can Fizz finish the over well?
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Holder, 1 run
